main event: On August 27, 1952, a white, glowing, round object was sighted over Sheffield, England.
interesting points: The object was observed by several police officers and other witnesses., It was approximately 30 feet in diameter and traveling at a high rate of speed., The object made a number of sudden, sharp turns., Numerous individuals, including children and adults, reported seeing the object., The incident generated media attention and was briefly covered in the national press.
